info.name: CLARIN Switchboard bridge
info.summary: The Switchboard bridge sends selected files to the CLARIN Language Resource Switchboard.
info.description: This Nextcloud plugin allows users to directly send files from their personal cloud store to the CLARIN Language Resource Switchboard. The user interface of Nextcloud is extended with an icon to open the files in the Switchboard. Once clicked, a new browser tab opens with the Switchboard website pre-loaded with the desired file. From there, the file can be processed by a number of different language-related processing tools. When selecting multiple files within Nextcloud, an option button is also made available in the files-batch options section. This option will open a new tab with the Switchboard for each selected resource.
